title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Let's Talk Heavyweights
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Let's Talk Heavyweights
description:
Mannix and Sergio Mora talk Deontay Wilder's return, a crossroads clash between Andy Ruiz and Luis Ortiz, Anthony Joshua's road back and more; Ruiz joins the show to talk his decision to take time off, his split with Eddy Reynoso, a future fight with Deontay Wilder, more; former NBA guard Nick Young talks his decision to get into boxing, his fight with rapper Blue Face, and the NBA player he wants to get into the ring. #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
